MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY24 postcode area of Borth, affecting properties in Ynyslas and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:15AM on 9th April 2021
